None.Name: Minefield
None.Description: Activate to place 4 mines within a 30m long line in front of the unit.

None.Name: Tainted Birth
None.Description: When being spawned the unit stirs up a lot of dust that deals 50 damage per second to every enemy within a 20m radius for 5 seconds.

None.Name: Life Stealer
None.Description: 15% of the damage dealt by the unit will be added to its life points.
